UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The antimicrobial potential of a new derivative of cathelicidin from Bungarus fasciatus against methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Tajbakhsh M, Karimi A, Tohidpour A, Abbasi N, Fallah F, Akhavan MM

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:22% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=125 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=31.2 µg/ml,Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:25% Cell death=106.5 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=77.7µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 51446(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=4µg/ml)
